description: Xero is a cloud-based accounting software for small businesses, providing invoicing, bank reconciliation, bookkeeping, and financial reporting in real time

capabilities.name: XERO_CREATE_BANK_TRANSACTION
capabilities.description: Create a bank transaction in Xero. Use SPEND for payments out or RECEIVE for money received.

capabilities.name: XERO_CREATE_CONTACT
capabilities.description: Create a new contact in Xero. Contacts can be customers, suppliers, or both.

capabilities.name: XERO_CREATE_INVOICE
capabilities.description: Create a new invoice in Xero. Supports both sales invoices (ACCREC) and bills (ACCPAY).

capabilities.name: XERO_CREATE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Create an inventory item in Xero. Items can be tracked for sales and/or purchases.

capabilities.name: XERO_CREATE_PAYMENT
capabilities.description: Create a payment in Xero to link an invoice with a bank account transaction.

capabilities.name: XERO_CREATE_PURCHASE_ORDER
capabilities.description: Create a purchase order in Xero to order goods/services from suppliers.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_ACCOUNT
capabilities.description: Retrieve a specific account from the chart of accounts by ID. Returns account code, name, type, and settings.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_ASSET
capabilities.description: Retrieve a specific asset by ID from Xero. Returns depreciation details and book value.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_BALANCE_SHEET_REPORT
capabilities.description: Retrieve Balance Sheet report from Xero. Shows assets, liabilities, and equity at a specific date.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_BUDGET
capabilities.description: Retrieve a budget from Xero. Budgets track planned vs actual spending by account.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_CONNECTIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to list active Xero connections. Use when you need to retrieve all current tenant connections for the authenticated user.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_CONTACT
capabilities.description: Retrieve a specific contact by ID from Xero. Returns full contact details including addresses and phone numbers.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_CONTACTS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of contacts. Use when you need up-to-date contact information with filtering, paging, or incremental updates.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_INVOICE
capabilities.description: Retrieve a specific invoice by ID from Xero. Returns full invoice details including line items and status.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_ITEM
capabilities.description: Retrieve a specific item by ID from Xero. Returns item code, name, pricing, and tax details.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_MANUAL_JOURNAL
capabilities.description: Retrieve a specific manual journal by ID from Xero. Returns full details including journal lines.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_ORGANISATION
capabilities.description: Retrieve organisation details from Xero. Returns company info, base currency, timezone, financial year settings, etc.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_PROFIT_LOSS_REPORT
capabilities.description: Retrieve Profit & Loss report from Xero. Shows income, expenses, and net profit for a specified period.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_PROJECT
capabilities.description: Retrieve a specific project by ID from Xero. Returns project details, deadlines, and status.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_PURCHASE_ORDER
capabilities.description: Retrieve a specific purchase order by ID from Xero. Returns full details including line items and status.

capabilities.name: XERO_GET_QUOTES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of quotes. Use when you need to list, filter, or page through sales quotes. Use after obtaining the tenant ID via connections.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_ACCOUNTS
capabilities.description: Retrieve chart of accounts from Xero. Returns all accounting codes used for categorizing transactions.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_ASSETS
capabilities.description: Retrieve fixed assets from Xero. Assets track depreciation and book value of capital equipment.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_ATTACHMENTS
capabilities.description: List all attachments for a specific entity in Xero (invoice, contact, etc.).

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_BANK_TRANSACTIONS
capabilities.description: Retrieve bank transactions from Xero. Includes spend (payments) and receive (receipts) transactions.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_CREDIT_NOTES
capabilities.description: Retrieve list of credit notes from Xero. Credit notes are issued to reduce amounts owed by customers.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_FILES
capabilities.description: Retrieve files from Xero Files. Lists documents stored in Xero's file management system.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_FOLDERS
capabilities.description: Retrieve folders from Xero Files. Lists document folders in Xero's file management system.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_INVOICES
capabilities.description: Retrieve a list of invoices from Xero. Supports filtering by status, contact, date range, and pagination.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Retrieve items (inventory/products) from Xero. Items can be tracked for sales and/or purchases.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_JOURNALS
capabilities.description: Retrieve journals from Xero. Journals show the accounting entries for all transactions.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_MANUAL_JOURNALS
capabilities.description: Retrieve manual journals from Xero. Manual journals are used for period-end adjustments and corrections.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_PAYMENTS
capabilities.description: Retrieve list of payments from Xero. Payments link invoices to bank transactions.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_PROJECTS
capabilities.description: Retrieve projects from Xero. Projects track time and costs for client work.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_PURCHASE_ORDERS
capabilities.description: Retrieve list of purchase orders from Xero. Purchase orders track goods/services ordered from suppliers.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_TAX_RATES
capabilities.description: Retrieve tax rates from Xero. Shows available tax codes and rates for the organization.

capabilities.name: XERO_LIST_TRACKING_CATEGORIES
capabilities.description: Retrieve tracking categories from Xero. Tracking categories are used to segment data for reporting (e.g., departments, regions).

capabilities.name: XERO_POST_INVOICE_UPDATE
capabilities.description: Tool to update an existing invoice. Use when you need to modify the details of an invoice after it's been created.

capabilities.name: XERO_UPDATE_CONTACT
capabilities.description: Update an existing contact in Xero. Only provided fields will be updated.

capabilities.name: XERO_UPLOAD_ATTACHMENT
capabilities.description: Upload a file attachment to a Xero entity (invoice, contact, etc.). Supports PDF, images, and documents.
